desc: Easy access to your oil, anytime. The RAM off-line filtration loop adapters allow easy access to hydraulic fluid inside a reservoir,oil drum,tote or gearbox for efficient filtering, sampling, and transport.

layout.text: The Reservoir Access Manifold (RAM) allows easy access to fluid inside reservoirs, drums, and gearboxes for efficient filtering, sampling, and transferring. Add a back up pump in minutes avoiding break downs.
